original_title: Fireplace and Melodies for the Holidays
overview: A soothing fireplace accompanied by 24 of your favorite Christmas songs. Enchant your guests with a crackling wood-burning fireplace on your television screen. Features 2 hours of radiant fire, the flames licking the logs and glowing embers underneath. Joyful and sentimental Christmas melodies are sure to enhance the ambiance and elevate your holiday spirit. Itâ€™s the perfect addition to your holiday festivities.
tagline: Experience the warmth and Magnificence of the holiday season.
title: Fireplace and Melodies for the Holidays
